SENT.plain: An infarct in the left middle cerebral artery territory in a 9 months old girl occurred in the course of Kawasaki's disease which in addition had induced a coronary aneurysm and a myocardial infarct
Embolism from the myocardial infarct was likely to have provoked the cerebral infarction
Neurological symptoms and signs are unusual in Kawasaki's disease
